content: the middle 3rd single_crochet of the colour b window 2 half_double_crochet when you reach the end of the round 2hdc in the last window and 25 single_crochet on the 25 chains of the loop join to the first half_double_crochet with an invisible join and cut a bit longer than usual when you thread a needle to hide the last thread stitch twice on the 3rd single_crochet colour b of this last corner to fasten it to the a colour as the other three corners hope you enjoy this © astrid schandy 2024 aschandy@yahoo no astrid s diagonals sample 5 the action let s get started row b astrid s diagonals sample nr color colour a 281 tangerine colour b 105 bridal white 1a chain 40 with orange start in 6th chain from the hook dc1 ch1 sk1 x 17 times double_crochet in the last chain you should have 18 windows 1b chain 38 with white lay your chain over the trellis and on 6th chain from the hook and through 2nd colour a window b16 f1 2a b b1 f15 b1 double_crochet 2b b2 f1 b10 f1 b3 3a f f1 b1
